title: News for August, 2024
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:newspaper]]
[[div class="pseudocrumbs" style="text-align: center"]]
**[[[news|Site News Hub]]]**
**« [[[news-07-2024|July 2024]]] | __[[[news-08-2024|August 2024]]]__ | [[[news-09-2024|September 2024]]] »**
[[/div]]

[[span class="placard"]][[size 75%]] **DISCLAIMER:** This is the Site News for the English Branch of the SCP Wiki. The opinions of the individual members of the Site News team that are presented in each edition of the Site News are their own thoughts and are not meant to be representative of the Site News team as a whole nor are they representative of the staff body as a whole. If you take issue with any of the contents, then feel free to reach out to the editor(s) and they will review the contents to see if there are any edits that need to be made. We intend to always deliver interesting content to you, and we understand that there may be times where controversial or unpopular opinions will be presented whether by our writers or our editor(s). Thank you for your understanding![[/size]][[/span]]

[[div class="anchor"]]
[[div class="tocbox"]]
[[div class="toc-u"]]
[[toc]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="breaker"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="section-header"]]
+ Editorial
[[/div]]

During the month of July 2024, the English SCP Wiki officially hit 20,000 articles! Congratulations to all the authors' hard work that helped us achieve this meaningful milestone!

[[>]]
[[span class="s-title"]]//- By DianaBerry//[[/span]]
[[/>]]

------

[[=image http://o5command-int.wdfiles.com/local--files/tech-team:graphic-templates/scp-logo-int-full-400.png]]

A new International Wiki has been recognized! Well, sort of. The Hungarian branch, or HU for short, has been recognized as an upcoming project with trustworthy staff and a growing userbase. You can visit it [http://scp-hu.wikidot.com/ here]! We wish the up and coming Hungarian Wiki the best of luck and steady growth.

[[>]]
[[span class="s-title"]]//- By Uncle Nicolini//[[/span]]
[[/>]]

-----

[[=image https://khoaigarret.wikidot.com/local--files/ht:scpfvn-staff-image-hub/Banner_FeralFes.png width=150px]]

The Vietnamese Branch is hosting FeralFest, a contest based around writing about animals and other wildlife! Posting deadline is August 4th and voting goes on until August 11th. Check out the details [http://scp-vn.wikidot.com/feralfes2024 here]! We look forward to seeing translations of the contest entries; be it here or on INT! 


[[>]]
[[span class="s-title"]]//- By Uncle Nicolini//[[/span]]
[[/>]]

-----



The ZH-TR Branch is hosting a Mythological Elements contest! In Chinese folklore, the word "elements" refers to the magical elements such as fire, water, metal, wood, air, etc. It was originally going to be an Elemental Periodic Table, but the contest runners decided against that in the end. Either way, the writing period was between July 15th and ended on August 21st, but voting ends on the 31st of August! We look forward to seeing translations, be it on EN or on INT!

[[>]]
[[span class="s-title"]]//- By Uncle Nicolini//[[/span]]
[[/>]]


-----
[[=image https://cuarteldelo5.wdfiles.com/local--files/secret%3Ac3g/banner1.png]]

And last, but finally not least, the ES Wiki is hosting a GoI contest, seeking to develop the smaller GoIs of the wiki and reimagining the older ones. The posting period begins on the 13th of August and ends on the 18th, and voting ends on the 31st of August. And as always, we look forward to seeing translations on EN and INT!

[[>]]
[[span class="s-title"]]//- By Uncle Nicolini//[[/span]]
[[/>]]


------
[[div class="section-header"]]
+ Writing and Art Prompts
[[/div]]

Site News is bringing you monthly writing and art prompts! Every month there will be user-submitted prompts to help inspire new pieces. Participation in these prompts is completely optional, and any pages based on the prompts will be featured in the next issue of Site News! If you're interested in submitting a prompt for next Site News, send a wikidot PM to [[*user ParallelPotatoes]]. One prompt submission per person, and up to five prompts will be shown in each edition of Site News. 

This month's prompts are below! 

[[size x-large]]Summer Heat[[/size]] //Submitted by FlyPurgatorio//
It's really hot out! Write something about heat, temperature, or the eternal fires of the pits of hell.

[[size x-large]]Leo Season[[/size]] //Submitted by Queerious//
It's Leo season! To celebrate our lion friends, write about horoscopes or a vain character!

The following article was inspired by a prompt and written this month!

[[size x-large]][https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/173love Everything Reminds Me of Him][[/size]] //Written by AwhRyan//
Inspired by "173's Birthday" from June 2024's prompts!


If you write an entry inspired by this or a previous month's prompts, feel free to send a wikidot PM to [[*user ParallelPotatoes]] to have it featured in the next Site News! There isn't a time limit on getting prompt submissions featured, so feel free to write for a previous month's prompts as well! [[footnote]]Please note that in the event of an official contest, contest entries that were inspired by a Site News prompt will be featured the month after the contest ends.[[/footnote]]

------
[[div class="section-header"]]
+ Seminars
[[/div]]

[[size x-large]]Critclub: Sunday, August 4, 2024 1:30 PM EST[[/size]]
We'll be hosting an edition of Critclub on the official Discord server! Fly, Fish and Psi will be going through several drafts that have been --sacrificed-- volunteered for a thorough live critting. We'll be going through line-by-line critique, overview crit, and some nifty tips and tricks for going through drafts. Come join us!
If you have any future drafts you'd like to donate for a live treatment, you can contact [[*user Fish^12]] or [[*user FlyPurgatorio]] on the official Discord or wikidot DMs.
This Seminar is a [https://discord.com/invite/scp Discord]-only event, but we'll record and you can listen back [https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/scp-wiki-archives on Spotify].

[[size x-large]]Wrathcon: Saturday, August 10, 2024 1:30 PM EST[[/size]]
Corax, Psi, Fly and Guaire will be giving into evil: it's the official Wrathcon remembrance service! We'll be reading, awarding well-deserved badges, and trying to remember what the fallen entries were about. Want to give some thoughts on the entries that were grimly torn down? What do you (evilly/falsly) remember? Contact one of the organizers: [[*user FlyPurgatorio]] or [[*user Prismal]] on the official Discord, or wikidot DM [[user FlyPurgatorio]] or [[user Guaire]]`. Alternatively, use this [https://forms.gle/A5LnnHveup1j925VA google form]!
An important reminder: evil =/= mean. Have fun but not at the expense of others!
This Seminar is on [https://discord.com/invite/scp Discord], but watch our socials! We'll record and you can listen back [https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/scp-wiki-archives on Spotify].
------

[[div class="section-header"]]
+ Features Last Month
[[/div]]

[[=]]
+++ Top Articles of the Month
[[/=]]

Ratings of course do not mean everything, but they are representative of what people happened to like seeing at the time. With this in mind, the following are the top-rated works last month, so if by some chance you haven't encountered them yet, be sure to check them out!

[[div class="f-flex"]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ Top-Rated SCP
[[/=]]

[[[SCP-8597|SCP-8597]]] by //PlaguePJP & J Dune//: **your month, your guy**

{{your month, your guy. believe hard}}

[[/div]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ Top-Rated Non-SCP
[[/=]]

[[[wrathcon|Live Camera Feed of Site-69, where Everything is Fine]]] by //Croquembouche//

{{Site-69 is a fucking joke.}}

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

-----

[[=]]
+++ Front Page Features
[[/=]]

Every month, an article is selected from each of the three common article types: SCP, Tale, and Group of Interest Format. These three articles are displayed on the front page for the month to bring further recognition to them.

[[=]]
//If you would like to view the previous front page features, you can view the archive for the SCPs [[[featured-scp-archive-ii | here]]], the archive for the Tales [[[featured-tale-archive-ii | here]]], and the archive for the GoI Formats [[[featured-goi-format-archive | here]]]!//
[[/=]]

[[div class="f-flex three"]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ SCP Article
[[/=]]

[[[SCP-7584]]] by //Sobek109//: **A Brief History of Artwork in the Ten-Tongue Empire**

{{SCP-7584 is the collective designation for 505 artworks.}}


[[/div]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ Tale
[[/=]]

[[[heresy|HEDVIG'S HERESY]]] by //Rounderhouse//

{{The Empress stepped cautiously into the throne room. It was deafeningly silent, and every tap of her fuladh feet against the marble floor rung out with a sharp click.}}


[[/div]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ GoI-Format
[[/=]]

[[[ambrose-lamplight|Ambrose Lamplight]]] by //Harmacy//

{{Mahi loam is the most powerful of spices. You see, even though your eyes and ears and mind grow numb, your soul's desperation for sensation increases one's taste by a staggering degree!}}


[[/div]]
[[/div]]

------

[[=]]
+++ Reviewers' Spotlights
[[/=]]

Works are featured on the site’s front page as part of the Reviewers’ Spotlight, which acknowledges the time and effort spent by forum reviewers helping other authors develop and edit and their works for the mainsite. Each month, community members are encouraged to nominate forum reviewers who have been both particularly helpful and active. Members of the Forum Criticism Team will then discuss the nominations, and select four prominent reviewers to choose the month’s Reviewers’ Spotlight front-page features.

[[=]]
//If you would like to view previous spotlights, you can view the archive for them [[[reviewers-spotlight-archive | here]]]!//
[[/=]]

[[div class="f-flex"]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ 1st of July
[[/=]]

[[[SCP-8686|SCP-8686: Best Days Of Our Lives: A Pseudogenesis Production]]] by //DoctorLilithSophia// [Featured by //Queerious//]

{{SCP-8686 is an anomalous theatre experience known as "The Best Days Of Our Lives".}}

[[/div]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ 9th of July
[[/=]]
 
[[[SCP-5705|SCP-5705: Powered by Thorium!™]]] by //Iszth// [Featured by //Mooagain//]

{{SCP-5705-1 is hostile and actively attempting to escape from the interior of SCP-5705.}}


[[/div]]
[[div class="f-con"]]

[[=]]
++++ 17th of July
[[/=]]

[[[FUCKHEAD]]] by //Fantem and Opossumistic// [Featured by //Dr Farstream//]

{{A body vibrating in the back of an APC. A Malfeasance BEHEMOTH.}}

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="section-header"]]
+ SCP Data & Trends
[[/div]]

All the goings-on of the site condensed into bite-sized takeaways! Is there a statistic or figure you would be interested in knowing? Let us know and we can feature it next time!
[[=]]
[[image https://co-team.wdfiles.com/local--files/site-news-image-hosting/august2024-1.png]]

[[image https://co-team.wdfiles.com/local--files/site-news-image-hosting/august2024-2.png]]

[[image https://co-team.wdfiles.com/local--files/site-news-image-hosting/august2024-3.png]]

[[image https://co-team.wdfiles.com/local--files/site-news-image-hosting/august2024-4.png]]

[[image https://co-team.wdfiles.com/local--files/site-news-image-hosting/august2024-5.png]]

[[/=]]
Like before, we are still renovating this section. It will likely be a couple months, but we will soon have a nice little stats section here. In the meantime, please enjoy our monthly charts.

Also, what do __YOU__ want to see in the monthly stats section? Any data you want to know about? Please leave a comment about it in the Discussion page or use [https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfTm7UWLqekHiapGYcbns0GAY1jtIB0Xy93FqQPxc2S2I-wVA/viewform this anonymous google form.]

[[>]]
[[span class="s-title"]]//- By Data Analysis Team//[[/span]]
[[/>]]

[[div class="section-header"]]
+ New Content this Month
[[/div]]

There is a multitude of wonderful works that are posted to the Wiki every month whether they be SCP articles, Tales, GoI Formats, Art pages, Author Pages, Essays, and more! Below, we have all of the creations for this month listed out by week and type (except for art pages, we did that earlier!) We have added little emojis next to articles that qualify to add some additional content. Below we have listed out the emojis we use and what they mean. Be sure to give them a look!

🤝 = **Co-authored works** - It is always interesting to see the dynamics of how people work together!
🌐 = **International works** - Articles translated from one of our international branches!
💯 = **Articles rated at +100 and higher** - These are articles that have seen success and should be celebrated for it!
📈 = **SCP articles rated under +30 and Tales and GoI Formats rated under +20** - Let's show these a little love!
